newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco still a hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco still a hold.

text.p: -- ING Barings said it was maintaining a hold rating on Brazilian private bank Unibanco.

-- The report follows the release of the bank's 1996 fourth quarter earnings of $0.86 per 1,000 shares, up 13 percent from the previous quarter earnings. For all of 1996, the company made $2.98 per 1,000 shares, up 29 percent from previous year's results, ING Barings said.
-- ING Barings said earnings were driven mostly by the bank's insurance net revenues and an improvement in the net interest margin.
-- It said that despite the strong bottom line and loan expansion during the quarter, it continues to believe that "the stock is at best fairly valued at current levels of 1.9 times P/BV."
-- Unibanco preferred shares traded at 42.30 reais, off 0.47 percent, on the Sao Paulo bolsa.
